Subject: JOB_0-SQL DROP Unable to complete execution
Description: We are getting multiple errors on this Job. This job is also running for 20+ hours without finishing, forcing us to kill it two days in a row.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer found process in SQL database that was blocking NEA tasks from running.
After clearing these stuck jobs out, NEA is working again.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue:
SQL drop table jobs are stuck and running for over 20+ hours with no movement.

Cause:
Another task in the DB is locking resources preventing the job from proceeding.

Resolution:
Killing the tasks that were stuck and blocking other jobs allowed the drop table command to proceed.

At this time I will be closing your ticket out for you. This case can be re-opened at any time if any related issues return.
Please feel free to reach out to the Netwrix team if you have any additional questions or would like assistance with any issues. Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case has been closed.
You will also receive a survey link, it would help us greatly to improve our support service if you could provide any feedback that you may have regarding your experience with this case.
